sentences.sentence: We have no time to gallivant about.
sentences.translation: 我们没有时间到处闲逛。

sentences.sentence: One day, a young man in a bad mood, because he walked out of the door, wander aimlessly gallivant about, unconsciously came to the deep forest.
sentences.translation: 有个年轻人，有一天，因心情不好，他走出了家门，漫无目的地到处闲逛，不知不觉间来到了森林深处。
